data.representation.images.color

Class ColorHistogramVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.representation.DataInstance
      • data.representation.images.color.ColorHistogramVector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ColorHistogramVector
extends DataInstance
    This class sets up the definitions for a simple color histogram for image analysis.
